messages.message:
A Gentle feedback - Took me a while to notice the "*person*" thing for a "*Add member*". Especially, when our internal docs explicitly say "Add member". Can we make this more explicit and noticeable with "*Add member*" text. Thanks !
> • Go to https://aihub-uat.internal.instabase.com/hub/settings/organizations/aihub-uat-internal and click “Add members” button.
Making this a button with blue background should also help.
cc: @Siya to consider usability feedback on workspace tab

Thanks for the feedback and tag! we did iterate on this and have a new UI pattern to make the primary add action prominent for a table.

@hannah we can make this change in the new flows involving workspaces.
